Join Us

Our work is highly interdisciplinary, please contact Dr. Kaichen Dong (or any group members) for details if you are interested in our research with the following academic backgrounds:

  1. Mathematics or Artificial Intelligence
  2. Physics
  3. Chemistry, Materials Sciences, or Chemical Engineering
  4. Photonics, Optical Engineering, or Telecommunications
  5. Microelectronics, Electrical Engineering, or Instrument Sciences
  6. Mechanical Engineering or Energy Engineering
  7. Automation or Robotics
  8. Other majors (motivation is the KEY)

We are looking for new group members with passion, talent, and grit! Both Chinese and international scholars are welcome! Currently available positions are as follows. Note that program names are NOT related to actual research directions.

  1. Postdoctoral Researchers
  2. Ph.D. students
    • Data Science and Information Technology (数据科学与信息技术)
  3. Master students
    • Data Science and Information Technology (数据科学与信息技术)
    • Electronic Information (电子信息)
    • Future Industry and Technology (未来科技与产业)
    • Instrument and Meter Engineering (仪器仪表工程)
    • Intelligent Manufacturing (智能制造)
  4. Undergraduate researchers
    • Both onsite research and remote theoretical research are welcome
